learning_outcomes: Understand and use B1 Work-Life Balance vocabulary
Apply B1 grammar structures in context

content.prompt_es: Une cada término con su definición correspondiente:

pairs.right: Time worked in addition to one's normal working hours
The quality of bending easily without breaking
A state of mental or emotional strain or tension

content.prompt_es: Escribe la forma verbal o gramatical correcta (conjugación, plural, etc.):
content.stimulus_en: If only I (be) ________ taller.

content.feedback_incorrect_es: Revisa bien la estructura de los tiempos verbales B1.

options.text: Could you tell me more? I'm curious.
I completely agree, it makes sense.
That would be perfect, thank you.
